comments:
CDT 2.0 GA
Linux RH EL3.

1. Build automatically is turned on.
2. I import a large PSF file (of 4 projects) which turns out to produce
many messages from CVS (regarding invalid line ending; one shown below).
These messages are shown in the Task list.
3. As an import completes, the build starts and yields a message on the
Task List, I think, producing a CME.

See Log file below.
Reproducible, although the stack trace varies.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.cvs.core 2 0 Jun 30, 2004 15:28:29.332
!MESSAGE CVS file /Sort/QuickSort/M4/SD_45.h either contains invalid line 
endings on the server (CR/LF instead of just LF) or is a binary file that is 
not marked as -
kb.

Changes from David, make this obsolete, the CView uses the LabelDecorator.
